title: Topic 005 Question 017
body: You have a connected Azure Stack Hub integrated system.
You deploy an Operator Access Workstation (OAW) name OAW1.
You need to transfer files between the Hardware Lifecycle Host (HLH) and OAW1. The solution must meet the following requirements:
•	Minimize how long it takes to transfer the files.
options: an Azure Stack Hub Storage account
a new file share on the HLH
